name: PortalKitPro VR Demo (very old)
description:
A quick demo of Portal Kit Pro's tech for use in VR, desktop games, and on mobile. Controls are simple- triggers to place portals, trackpad to move, and the grip to grab objects.

This demo is very similar to the popular game Portal, but the actual portal system is general-application and behaves as expected for almost anything including raycasting (shooting through portals), physics, through-portal interactions (such as reaching into a portal bag, grabbing a sword, and drawing it), and more. Additionally, the portals are extremely optimized, and run quickly on everything from VR apps to phone games.

NOTE:

This is the first demo, so there may be bugs. If you get any, please report them to me. I would appreciate it.

(If you do not have a VR headset but still wish to take a look, here is a video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9K_Lcf9g_C4)
